attributes.title: 3 Golden Rules of Life || Nithya Satsang || 07 December 2019
attributes.description:
Title: 3 Golden Rules of Life
Name Program: Nithya Satsang with HDH Nithyananda Paramashivam
Session on: 3 Golden Rules of Life. How to have liberating mental set up.
Date: 07 Dec 2019

In this Nithya Satsang Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Jagatguru Mahasannidhanam His Divine Holiness Bhagavan #Nithyananda Paramashivam explains 3 Golden Rules of Life, The Fundamental Principles of Hinduism.
1. Extreme Life Positive 
2. Absolute Liberation
3. Ultimate Enlightening 
Principle of liberation is making you experience higher and higher Reality. Life in Hinduism is liberating means raising you to next next level of Consciousness. Whenever you are hit with strong sufferings of life, settle down with Paramashiva you will wake up to next level of Reality, you will be raised to next level of Enlightenment. Nothing can be compared to liberating mental set up of life. HDH further explains Strength is Non Violence. Non Violence comes from Powerfulness. Non Violence response to life comes from Liberating Cognitions.
